title: Doom Bots of Doom disabled?
body: I was just playing a bit of Doom Bots to pass the time, but suddenly the mode dissappeared? I haven't seen anything regarding this so far, so is it just me?

replies.body:
Because the Doom Bots of Doom mode is a Rotating Game Mode (RGM), it's only available during certain weekends. But don't worry; it'll be back next weekend! ;)

> Doom Bots will be playable from October 20 through October 24, and then will return next week from October 28 through October 31. GLHF!

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-25

Ah cool, thanks a ton! I thought it was a little weird, as I played it early Tuesday morning (I haven't played League in a little while) - So I found it pretty weird to suddenly dissappear out of the blue :)

Okay, but, like, it says you have until November 3rd to get the icon... but how can you if the game mode isn't active past the 31st? Jesus Riot, at least make the game mode available during the event for people who work weekends.

Doombots will return this weekend!  Bookmark our current[ rotating game mode schedule ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-25)to stay up to date on upcoming games!
